html:
7.22.20  2:56 am   How do you go from writing a small tune or loop of a track to a fully fledged song?

      usually what seems to work best (for me) is to make sure you fully write the song first, before really recording it. know exactly how it goes, and for exactly how long. Doing a full recording/arrangement of a song is crazy enough, and if you don't know how the song goes you'll surely crumble. unless you are doing the type of arrangement that can be delivered in its final form in real time. It's like building a house. you have to know the specific plans of the house before building it, unless you have technology so advanced that the house can be built instantly, in which case yes you could definitely improvise the house

7.22.20  1:30 am   Hey bill what is the BIG thing your working on?

      videomaking

7.22.20  1:30 am   How do you get back from a creative slump? 

      maybe you could melt completely and take on a new form

7.22.20  1:13 am   Are you running for president?

      no

7.22.20  12:32 am   what is the best time of day?

      0:00

7.22.20  12:26 am   What are your thoughts on goldfish?

      is it a pet? is it a snack? check the packaging because there's 2 types

7.22.20  12:02 am   i just played the melody to amazing grace in like 5 different keys by tranposing by ear and fucking around on my decidedly un-pianolike instrument to learn what fingerings play what notes. it gave me the chills. i'm telling you this because nobody i know irl would understand why i'm so pumped about this. but idk man i'm pretty proud of myself and now i just wanna keep letting my ears tell my brain to tell my hands to do things on an instrument forever

      that's the perfect amount of time for such a task

7.21.20  11:31 pm   do you like math

      it haunts to the deepest edges of this universe but yes

7.21.20  11:21 pm   whats yuor opinion on lint rollers

      they're so majestic

7.21.20  10:25 pm   what does it mean when they put a president in a peach?

     i think it means they have to wear a dunce cap

     do they get air?

     yes

     are they okay?

     totally fine

7.21.20  10:07 pm   What are your thoughts on existence

      could come in handy

7.21.20  9:34 pm   What was Person in "Hi I'm Steve"'s name?

      the same name as your name

7.21.20  8:46 pm   choose a name and i swear to god ill name my cat that.

      that's not what i want

7.21.20  6:43 pm   did the easter bunny tell you anything important that we should know?

      yes, easter is actually part of a 4-quadrant matrix of holidays, which are all part of the same holiday, and are color coded by the predominant color of the candy packaging

7.21.20  6:00 pm   do you still have interest in doing an album?

      would rather do something much better

7.21.20  5:11 pm   Do you ever go back and listen to any of your old songs for the memories or to acknowledge your growth as a musician?

      yes

7.21.20  4:53 pm   howd u make time mop sound so good

      must have been in a good mood because i'd recently sold my soul then immediately bought it back for a much lower price

7.21.20  4:18 pm   hello bill, are you going to make the thing inventor

      making it now

7.21.20  4:08 pm   When did you know you wanted to be a musician? 

      always

7.21.20  3:17 pm   Thoughts on the chromatic scale?

      could come in handy

7.21.20  3:13 pm   What's your favorite genre of music?

      regular

7.21.20  3:05 pm   MR Bill, i have a question for you. What is a neon letter?

      i have no earthly idea

7.21.20  2:54 pm   What was your most favorite vid to make

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

7.21.20  1:43 pm   What do you think about bill wurtz?

      you'd wonder why he won't just do the thing

7.21.20  1:38 pm   Which jingle describes your current status most accurately?

      gonna do the thing (finally do the thing)

7.21.20  12:56 pm   why are you wholesome

      being wholesome is bad ass

7.21.20  12:53 pm   What's your favorite fruit? 

      the vegetable

7.21.20  12:07 pm   What is in the fragile box in your unboxing video?Also what was the question Daimien Maymdiem skipped in your maybe I could eat blades of grass video?

      the thing in the box was the question damien skips, and the question damien skips is 'what's the thing in the box'

7.21.20  11:17 am   Someone said you are working on a video that is taking a lot of time. Is it true?

     no, but the good news is i am working on ways for videos to not take a long time

7.21.20  10:39 am   I have a song idea but can't think of lyrics. How should I think of the lyrics?

      i don't know. the problem with doing it this way is the lyrics have to be perfect. this can be done, but sometimes it's better to just come up with the lyrics and music at the exact same time. that way they are guaranteed to be perfect for each other

7.21.20  10:32 am   What do you think of sand?

      love it, can't get enough of it

7.21.20  10:12 am   do you pronounce HOTEWIG as "hoe twig" or "hote wig" or "hoe tewig"

      history of the entire world, i guess

7.21.20  10:05 am   What are you learning now?

      how to manage everything

7.21.20  8:36 am   are you normal?

      technically yes

7.21.20  7:26 am   which genre (pop, rock, etc.) would you put your music in?

      normal

7.21.20  7:23 am   I made it so my guitar has 13 notes instead of the regular 12. My band gets angry when I use note 13. Should I apologize and fix it back or lean into it?

      after examining closely i've determined that your story is not true

7.21.20  7:16 am   What's the best type of pizza? 

      perfect

7.21.20  6:38 am   how are you so creative

      we'll see

7.21.20  6:24 am   hi bill, i'm writing my masters thesis on you and your work. what, if anything, is internet about you and your music?

     the delivery method for the content

     what makes something internet besides being on the internet?

     perhaps being the actual internet itself

7.21.20  6:23 am   Do you ever dream in the same style as your video graphics?

      maybe if i could make some significant technological breakthroughs and improvements

7.21.20  5:38 am   Do you like France?

      maybe if they could make it even more french

7.21.20  5:29 am   What is ice???

      i'm not sure

7.21.20  5:04 am   why are fish stupid?

      this is due to intelligence

7.21.20  4:33 am   7.20.20  3:37 pm

Couldn't you just add some frames of black screen at the end, to prevent you from chopping off anything earlier?

      for the musical loops, that would devastate the timing. Would work fine for the ones that aren't supposed to play like a continuous song

7.21.20  4:09 am   You were near to finish your videos reinventing work.

     that's not true, but i always wish i am

     What has happened? 

     made more progress

7.21.20  3:38 am   how do you make a maker make a thing while the thing maker is simultaneously making a place where things get made so the things can be made fast and simultaneously but also simultaneously make your thing?

      just try to stay calm and take it one step at a time. this is the right path, history demonstrates this, again and again

7.21.20  2:51 am   So did you have like a finished playable version all the way through of bad thing before you recorded it,

     yes

      and then just fleshed out the arrangement/production?

      what the heck is fleshing

7.21.20  2:39 am   what does the questions page look like from your screen

      about like this

7.21.20  2:24 am   what makes life worth living

      could be you

7.21.20  1:43 am   do you like answering the funny questions or the serious questions more?

      i don't really keep track of which is which. that's probably because i can't tell the difference
